Imprint.disputeResolutionContent: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): [Link to ODR platform](https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr). We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
